Prefixes.Name: One
Prefixes.Effect: Can only be fired once per day. Deals 10x Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Normal
Prefixes.Effect: Appearance of a Common gun.

Prefixes.Name: Adorable
Prefixes.Effect: 25% chance to distract Enemies with baby animal hallucinations.

Prefixes.Name: Gaudy
Prefixes.Effect: Highly reflective, which can be used to temporarily blind Enemies, giving them -3 on Attack Rolls.

Prefixes.Name: Cheerful
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to all Talk Checks while equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Jumbled
Prefixes.Effect: Has the Accuracy and Damage of one gun type, but the Range and bonuses of another.

Prefixes.Name: Classy
Prefixes.Effect: Gun will only fire if the wielder has the pinky of their shooting hand out.

Prefixes.Name: Economic
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies drop 2 gold per Hit and 5 gold per Crit.

Prefixes.Name: Certain
Prefixes.Effect: Grants a +2 bonus during Badass attempts.

Prefixes.Name: Humdrum
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit experience ennui.

Prefixes.Name: Lively
Prefixes.Effect: This gun has an Al that thinks it's alive. It can open any door once per day.

Prefixes.Name: Bitter
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies get -1 to their Attack Rolls for each Enemy killed by this gun in this encounter.

Prefixes.Name: Sleepy
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit are Slowed.

Prefixes.Name: Deafening
Prefixes.Effect: Screams when fired. dealing 1 Damage to all adjacent targets.

Prefixes.Name: Selfish
Prefixes.Effect: Deals 1d6 Damage to wielder when changing to another equipped gun.

Prefixes.Name: Obtainable
Prefixes.Effect: Must be picked up using an Interact (17+) Check. Deals 2x Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Abrasive
Prefixes.Effect: Adds +1 Crit to Melee Attacks.

Prefixes.Name: Smelly
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit take 1d6 Radiation Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Tart
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies react as if they have eaten something tart, getting -1 to their next Attack Roll.

Prefixes.Name: Worried
Prefixes.Effect: Crits have a 50% chance to make BR 8 or less Enemies flee.

Prefixes.Name: Swift
Prefixes.Effect: Grants a free Melee Attack each turn.

Prefixes.Name: Two
Prefixes.Effect: Creates a duplicate gun. Must be fired at the same time. 3x Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Toothsome
Prefixes.Effect: Gets a Bite Attack each turn for 1d6 Damage to an adjacent target.

Prefixes.Name: Light
Prefixes.Effect: Fires rays of light that deal +1d6 Incendiary Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Boundless
Prefixes.Effect: Generates a Loot Pile when it Hits an Enemy.

Prefixes.Name: Incandescent
Prefixes.Effect: Shines brighter when being fired.

Prefixes.Name: Elfin
Prefixes.Effect: Increases Movement by 1 square while firing.

Prefixes.Name: Splendid
Prefixes.Effect: Deals 2x Damage to Badass-type Enemies.

Prefixes.Name: Small
Prefixes.Effect: Can have a 4th gun equipped as long as this gun is equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Pumped
Prefixes.Effect: Lifts Enemies Hit a foot off of the ground.

Prefixes.Name: Horrible
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies killed by this gun explode.

Prefixes.Name: Fresh
Prefixes.Effect: First Attack of an encounter deals 2x Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Zesty
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies killed by this gun grant the wielder 1 Badass Token.

Prefixes.Name: Utter
Prefixes.Effect: Has a secret password that activates 3x Damage for 2 turns. Wielder can guess once per encounter.

Prefixes.Name: Far-Flung
Prefixes.Effect: Double the Range of any Thrown item while this gun is equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Superb
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to Mods on the gun.

Prefixes.Name: Knotty
Prefixes.Effect: Ties an Enemy's shoes together, reducing their Movement by 1.

Prefixes.Name: Wrathful
Prefixes.Effect: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies that have Damaged the wielder.

Prefixes.Name: Panoramic
Prefixes.Effect: Fires in a 180 degree arc. Hits/Crits can each be applied to a different Enemy in Range.

Prefixes.Name: Critical
Prefixes.Effect: Rolled Hits become Crits. Rolled Crits become misses.

Prefixes.Name: Practical
Prefixes.Effect: Swapping to a different gun grants the wielder a Badass Token.

Prefixes.Name: Strong
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to all Interact Checks while equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Relevant
Prefixes.Effect: Will deliver cryptic Effectrmation on a topic up to 3x a day.

Prefixes.Name: Tense
Prefixes.Effect: 30% chance to taze the Enemy, dealing 1d6 Shock Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Stupendous
Prefixes.Effect: Double the Hits of this gun. Attacks deal 2d4 Damage to the wielder.

Prefixes.Name: Suitable
Prefixes.Effect: Can disguise the wielder in a suit of any kind once per day.

Prefixes.Name: Unwieldy
Prefixes.Effect: Twice the size of a normal gun. 2x Damage. Reloading takes 2 turns.

Prefixes.Name: Woozy
Prefixes.Effect: Each time an Enemy is Hit by this gun, 10% chance they pass out.

Prefixes.Name: Grotesque
Prefixes.Effect: Gun looks horrific, possibly cursed. A counter increases every time it kills an Enemy.

Prefixes.Name: Puny
Prefixes.Effect: Appearance of a miniature gun.

Prefixes.Name: Tawdry
Prefixes.Effect: When Reloaded, becomes a grenade that deals 3d8 Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Nutty
Prefixes.Effect: Instantly kills any Enemy with a nut allergy.

Prefixes.Name: Adhesive
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit begin to stick to anything they come into contact with.

Prefixes.Name: Exciting
Prefixes.Effect: 50% chance for Explosive rounds.

Prefixes.Name: Mixed
Prefixes.Effect: For each Hit/Crit, gather the next die for Damage - d6,d8,d10,d12,d20.

Prefixes.Name: Aback
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit in the front are spun backwards.

Prefixes.Name: Labored
Prefixes.Effect: Adds +3 DMG Mod if standing still.

Prefixes.Name: Questionable
Prefixes.Effect: Deals 2x Damage to Enemies that can question their existence.

Prefixes.Name: Aberrant
Prefixes.Effect: Gains the stats of a random gun type.

Prefixes.Name: Resolute
Prefixes.Effect: Cannot be fired on the first turn of an encounter. Deals 2x Damage.

Prefixes.Name: Far
Prefixes.Effect: Double the Range of this gun.

Prefixes.Name: Mad
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit have a 50% chance of being Taunted.

Prefixes.Name: Grey
Prefixes.Effect: Deals 2x Damage. Enemies Hit drop 1 less Loot Pile and only drop Common items.

Prefixes.Name: Damp
Prefixes.Effect: Creates puddles of water under Enemies Hit.

Prefixes.Name: Actually
Prefixes.Effect: Can reroll Accuracy once per turn when firing this gun.

Prefixes.Name: Jazzy
Prefixes.Effect: 10% chance the non-Boss Enemy lets go of any weapons and starts doing 'jazz hands.'

Prefixes.Name: Frightening
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies within 2 squares are compelled to take Cover.

Prefixes.Name: Shaky
Prefixes.Effect: Gun shakes uncontrollably; Enemies Hit also shake uncontrollably.

Prefixes.Name: Scintillating
Prefixes.Effect: 50% chance to Hit the chest or groin of Enemy.

Prefixes.Name: Handsomely
Prefixes.Effect: Add Damage equal to your Talk modifier.

Prefixes.Name: Hysterical
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit burst out laughing, causing -1 to Attack Rolls.

Prefixes.Name: Impolite
Prefixes.Effect: Randomly burps out a Loot Pile when fired.

Prefixes.Name: Unable
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit cannot take Mayhem Actions.

Prefixes.Name: Towering
Prefixes.Effect: Wielder appears twice their size while gun is equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Parallel
Prefixes.Effect: Rounds split into 2 parallel lines that can Hit Enemies in 2 adjacent squares.

Prefixes.Name: Mundane
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to all Sneak Checks while equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Breezy
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies targeted them 1 square backwards.

Prefixes.Name: Disgusted
Prefixes.Effect: Deals + 1d6 Corrosive Damage. Enemies killed die badly.

Prefixes.Name: Imaginary
Prefixes.Effect: Appears as if you are not holding any gun. Makes fake firing noises when fired.

Prefixes.Name: Knowing
Prefixes.Effect: Knows all. Can ask the gun a question once per day.

Prefixes.Name: Joyous
Prefixes.Effect: Plays upbeat music when being fired.

Prefixes.Name: Clever
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to all Insight Checks while equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Abhorrent
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies cannot stay within 1 square while this gun is equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Open
Prefixes.Effect: Once per turn, you may Reload this gun as a free Action without generating Mayhem.

Prefixes.Name: Several
Prefixes.Effect: Splits into 2 guns that are dual wielded.

Prefixes.Name: Honorable
Prefixes.Effect: All rounds Hit Enemies in the front.

Prefixes.Name: Synonymous
Prefixes.Effect: Grants Guild bonuses twice.

Prefixes.Name: Madly
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit have 50% chance of becoming Confused.

Prefixes.Name: Obnoxious
Prefixes.Effect: Guaranteed Insight Check once per day but you have to listen to the gun drone on and on and on.

Prefixes.Name: Holistic
Prefixes.Effect: Damage is dealt to Shield, Armor, and Health.

Prefixes.Name: Few
Prefixes.Effect: Max 1 Hit. Deal an additional 3 Damage for each unused Hit.
Enemies Hit are considered to be under a legally binding

Prefixes.Name: Legal
Prefixes.Effect: contract to drop 1 extra Loot Pile when they die.

Prefixes.Name: Abiding
Prefixes.Effect: Grants +1 to all Search Checks while equipped.

Prefixes.Name: Unfair
Prefixes.Effect: An Extra Attack with this gun does not generate Mayhem.

Prefixes.Name: Tender
Prefixes.Effect: Converts 10% of Damage dealt into Health for an adjacent ally.

Prefixes.Name: Same
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit will take an equal amount of Damage from the gun for each Attack.

Prefixes.Name: Overconfident
Prefixes.Effect: If Accuracy Roll is 10 or less, all Hits are Crits.

Prefixes.Name: Eatable
Prefixes.Effect: Can consume the gun when Reloading to gain 2d4 Health.

Prefixes.Name: Thirsty
Prefixes.Effect: Converts 10% of Damage dealt into Health.

Prefixes.Name: Imminent
Prefixes.Effect: Enemies Hit take increasing Damage each turn, starting at 1 and adding 1 with each Hit/turn.
